name: Ancoris
description:
Ancoris is an award-winning cloud solutions provider. We offer consulting, deployment, development and support services for innovative and cost effective cloud projects. As a Google Apps Premier Enterprise Partner we deploy messaging, collaboration and unified communication solutions.
Ancoris is also a Google Cloud Platform Consulting Partner developing custom business applications, integrating business intelligence solutions on Google BigQuery and implementing infrastructure solutions such as Google Cloud Storage gateways for archiving and DR. Our customers include global multinationals, large enterprises, small and medium businesses and public sector organisations. More information can be found at www.ancoris.com.
READ MORE...

locations.address: Lily Hill House, Lily Hill Road
